## Importing data

```{r}
election_data <- read.csv("./election_data.csv")
wine_data <- read.csv("./wine_data.csv")
attach(election_data)
attach(wine_data)
```
## 1. The linear probability model

#### Part A:

```{r}
election_data$winner <- as.numeric(election_data$winner == "Trump")
reg1 <- lm(winner ~ pop2014 + under18 + density + black + hispanic, data = election_data)
stargazer(
  reg1,
  title = "Linear Regression Results",
  type = "html",
  align = TRUE,
  dep.var.labels = c("Winner"),
  covariate.labels = c("Total Population (in 2014)", "Under 18 Population", "Population Density", "Black Population", "Hispanic Population")
)
```

#### Part C:

```{r}
predict_data_1 <- data.frame(
  pop2014 = 250000,
  under18 = 10 / 100, # Convert percentages to proportions for the model
  density = 175,
  black = 45 / 100,
  hispanic = 10 / 100
)
predicted_prob_1 <- predict(reg1, newdata = predict_data_1)
print(predicted_prob_1)
```

#### Part D:

```{r}
predict_data_2 <- data.frame(
  pop2014 = 1000000,
  under18 = 20 / 100, # Convert percentages to proportions for the model
  density = 1000,
  black = 85 / 100,
  hispanic = 5 / 100
)
predicted_prob_2 <- predict(reg1, newdata = predict_data_2)
print(predicted_prob_2)
```

## 2. Logistic Regression

#### Part A:

```{r}
reg2 <- glm(formula = winner ~ pop2014 + under18 + density + black + hispanic, data = election_data, family = "binomial")
stargazer(
  reg2,
  title = "Logistic Regression Results",
  type = "html",
  align = TRUE,
  dep.var.labels = c("Winner"),
  covariate.labels = c("Total Population (in 2014)", "Under 18 Population", "Population Density", "Black Population", "Hispanic Population")
)
```

#### Part B:

```{r}
summary(reg2)
```

#### Part C:

```{r}
prob_1 <- data.frame(pop2014 = 1000000, under18 = 20 / 100, density = 1000, black = 85 / 100, hispanic = 5 / 100)
predict(reg2, prob_1, type = "response")
```

#### Part E:

```{r}
b0 <- coef(reg2)[1]
b1 <- coef(reg2)[2]
b2 <- coef(reg2)[3]
b3 <- coef(reg2)[4]
b4 <- coef(reg2)[5]
b5 <- coef(reg2)[6]
pop2014_value <- 250000
under18_value <- 25 / 100
density_value <- 100
hispanic_value <- 10 / 100
black_threshold <- -(b0 + b1 * pop2014_value + b2 * under18_value + b3 * density_value + b5 * hispanic_value) / b4
print(black_threshold)
```
